snippet: Brad Meester has played in Jacksonville for his entire 14-season career and is the only person to have played for all of the team’s coaches.
abstract: NFL Roundup; veteran Jacksonville Jaguars center Brad Meester announces his retirement following 14 seasons; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brad Meester has played in Jacksonville for his entire 14-season career and is the only person to have played for all of the team’s coaches.
